# datapackage

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/datapackage)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=datapackage)
<!-- badges: end -->

datapackage is an R package to read and write [Frictionless Data Packages](https://frictionlessdata.io/data-package/).

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("inbo/datapackage")
```
